# The ctype extension

Configure the `ctype` extension.

This extension provides support for character type checking according to the
locale.

## EXT_CTYPE

* Default: `ON`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## EXT_CTYPE_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
